(c) Other Exceptions. All payments hereunder are exclusive of: (i) any trial or promotional periods during which a Subscriber receives access to the Programming before such Subscriber's credit card is charged; and (ii) refunds, charge backs and fees attributable to contested credit card transactions

(d) Summary of Timing. The parties acknowledge the following that establishes timing of payments: (1) Distributor receives a carrier statement saying how much Distributor will be paid; (2) 30-45 days later the Carrier pays Distributor; (3) when Distributor is paid by a carrier, Distributor makes royalty payments to

_issues.detail: Non-standard governing law: the State of Florida without regard to conflicts of law provisions
